title: Dr Jacobs Naturals Pure Castile Vegan Bar Soap (Citrus Crush Cocktail/Minty Cucumber Mojito, 5 oz, 2-Pack) - Triple Milled Exfoliating, Made with Premium Organic Oils - Vegan, No Palm Oil, GMO Free - Concentrated, Hypoallergenic and Dermatologist Approved
features: WE RAISE THE BAR – Exfoliating beads in the bar soap help to brighten and renew the skin, creating an invigorating feeling throughout. Ideal for Bathroom, Shower, Office. Bring a new bar on your vacation. Never tried a natural soap? This is the perfect opportunity to try one.

PURE CASTILE REJUVENATING CITRUS SOAP - Orange and ginger essential oils work together to create a clean and invigorating scent in our Citrus Pure Castile Foam Hand Soap with moisture-enhancing aloe vera and Vitamin E. Oranges are known to be rich in antioxidants and may help in reducing acne breakouts, speed the healing of wounds, and prevent scarring. With the B complex vitamins in oranges, they can also improve the blood flow to the skin, giving you a healthy skin tone.
TRULY NATURAL - Each castile bar soap is made from non-GMO and plant-based ingredients. They’re completely free of parabens, sulfates, synthetics, and gluten.

GREAT FOR THE ENVIRONMENT- Dr. Jacobs Naturals Castile Soap is recognized by PETA, People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals, as a cruelty-free brand. All our products are completely vegan with plant-based biodegradable ingredients, and we do no animal testing. Our packaging are are made from recycled plastic bottles. Dr. Jacobs also doesn’t use palm oil in creation of their castile products, we support authenticity and natural goodness without harming the environment and indigenous lands.

CLEAN LIVING, MADE WITH LOVE – Dr. Jacobs is a Brooklyn, NY-based family company, with the mission of creating soaps that are healthy for your skin, provide a luxurious experience, and both cruelty-free and vegan. 100% Made in the USA. The ONLY Certified-hypoallergenic and dermatologist-tested Castile soap brand on the market.

title: Dr. Jacobs Naturals, Triple Milled Loofah Castile Bar Soap
